channel.title: ~~Clan Wars [Finished] /w Pics~~
channel.description:
[b][size=20pt]~~CLAN WARS~~[/size][/b] [i][size=15pt] Better Version [/size][/i] ______________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________
[b][i][size=15pt] IF YOU OPENED THIS, PLEASE READ THIS THREAD AND REPLY (WETHER YOU HATE IT OR NOT, PLEASE TELL ME) [/size][/i][/b]
~Hey guys, I made a new version of Clan Wars that is sure to top all of the versions out right now~
[b]The reason it beats most servers is because... [/b]
-Almost all servers with Clan Wars have a shitty remake of Castle Wars or they just make a pk box, throw two portals in and just have the two "Clans" fight each other to the death -Also, the other servers don't have rewards (most of the time) and (this will be later on) I will soon be adding a Clan Wars points system, with a Clan Wars scoreboard...
[b]What my Clan Wars has... [/b]
-Two Clans -Two Portals -A Clan Wars choosing center -A portal to go to the Clan Wars choosing center -Rewards -...and more!
----HOW TO PLAY----
You start off at the Clan Wars choosing center and you pick which clan you want to be in; Bloods, or Drifts... Then you go to your clans section of the Clan Wars arena (Lava Maze) and you obtain a Clan Wars ring (depending on which clan you're in) and a cape. You put on your cape so that your clan members don't attack you instead (because you can kill your own clan members)... So the object of the game is to get the other clan's ring from killing other members of the opposite clan... Then once you get both rings you leave through the Clan Wars exit portal (you also have to have your clan's cape)... Then after you exit through the Clan Portal you appear in front of the Clan Wars chest of which you still need both rings (but you loose your cape when you exit Clan Wars) and so if you have both rings then you are able to recive your reward(500k)...
I will soon randomize rewards and add an energy portal so that way people don't kill you when you just start in Clan Wars...
[b]Starting Portal[/b] [URL=http://img521.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0003ij9.png][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/549/amazon0003ij9.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Clan Choosing Center[/b] [URL=http://img515.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0007aw5.png][IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/8824/amazon0007aw5.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Blood Clan[/b] [URL=http://img521.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0009rl0.png][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/408/amazon0009rl0.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Drift Clan[/b] [URL=http://img515.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0008xk0.png][IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/8256/amazon0008xk0.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Clan Exit Portal, You need BOTH rings and your cape[/b] [URL=http://img515.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0010kt8.png][IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/852/amazon0010kt8.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Clan Wars Chest[/b] [URL=http://img521.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0011ax3.png][IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/4528/amazon0011ax3.th.png[/img][/URL]
[b]Clan Wars Chest Rewards[/b] [URL=http://img515.imageshack.us/my.php?image=amazon0012ky4.png][IMG]http://img515.imageshack.us/img515/5192/amazon0012ky4.th.png[/img][/URL]

item.title: ~~Clan Wars [Finished] /w Pics~~
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

well i did explain everything… i told them what it did and why it did it after every thing… but it’s not really castle wars, because when people play it, they don’t play it with the stratagies that they use in castle wars, and absolutly NO ONE helped me on making player made clans, so i ended up having to do that instead… i mean my help thread had at least 40 something veiws, and absolutly NO replies at all… it really sucked… but actually in my opinion this isnt as good as i had origionally hoped it would be… my original attempt was to have…

-Player made clans
-A clan scoring board (to show which clans where on top)
-A clan chat system
-Rewards (still)
-A larger arena

but of course… everyone had to be a dick, and they didn’t at least say SOMETHING… so i was stuck with this…

Read full topic

item.title: ~~Clan Wars [Finished] /w Pics~~
item.dc:creator: @WRX WRX`
item.description:
@WRX wrote:

It’s actually alright, although why call it clan wars? when it is actually basically castle wars…

2 teams
2 portals
rewards

castle wars?

If the tutorial was locked because of copy and paste then make sure you explain everything. Otherwise your just going to be wasting both the mopar staff and yourself’s time.

Read full topic

item.title: ~~Clan Wars [Finished] /w Pics~~
item.dc:creator: @00rYn00 00rYn00
item.description:
@00rYn00 wrote:

                                                       [b][size=20pt]~~CLAN WARS~~[/size][/b]
                                                       [i][size=15pt]        Better Version [/size][/i]

[size=15pt] IF YOU OPENED THIS, PLEASE READ THIS THREAD AND REPLY (WETHER YOU HATE IT OR NOT, PLEASE TELL ME) [/size]

~Hey guys, I made a new version of Clan Wars that is sure to top all of the versions out right now~

The reason it beats most servers is because…

-Almost all servers with Clan Wars have a shitty remake of Castle Wars or they just make a pk box, throw two portals in and just have the two “Clans” fight each other to the death
-Also, the other servers don’t have rewards (most of the time) and (this will be later on) I will soon be adding a Clan Wars points system, with a Clan Wars scoreboard…

What my Clan Wars has…

-Two Clans
-Two Portals
-A Clan Wars choosing center
-A portal to go to the Clan Wars choosing center
-Rewards
-…and more!

----HOW TO PLAY----

You start off at the Clan Wars choosing center and you pick which clan you want to be in; Bloods, or Drifts… Then you go to your clans section of the Clan Wars arena (Lava Maze) and you obtain a Clan Wars ring (depending on which clan you’re in) and a cape. You put on your cape so that your clan members don’t attack you instead (because you can kill your own clan members)…
So the object of the game is to get the other clan’s ring from killing other members of the opposite clan… Then once you get both rings you leave through the Clan Wars exit portal (you also have to have your clan’s cape)… Then after you exit through the Clan Portal you appear in front of the Clan Wars chest of which you still need both rings (but you loose your cape when you exit Clan Wars) and so if you have both rings then you are able to recive your reward(500k)…

I will soon randomize rewards and add an energy portal so that way people don’t kill you when you just start in Clan Wars…

Starting Portal

Clan Choosing Center

Blood Clan

Drift Clan

Clan Exit Portal, You need BOTH rings and your cape
